data.text:
I book this hotel for 2 nights (was planing next week to book more 2 nights as o have meetings in Dubai). Unfortunately i had issue with my card so i called 23rd of October to ask them not to cancel my booking and i will pay upon check in. The next day before 2 hours i arrived i send message i will pay upon check in, because i saw notification in booking that my card invalid.
Despite of  informing them twice, when i reach hotel my booking was cancelled. And they offer me 5 star hotel rate for some special, last room. 
I didnt say anything and i left back to home which is almost 2 hours away. Nice try to trick people to do upsell as i have genius discount from booking. Very professional. By the way hotel in real is so far from pictures. Hope you will never book it even for business trip.
data.title: Very bad impressions

data.text: This hotel is the perfect definition of good from the outside but trash from the inside , Staff are not friendly , you pay for HOTEL PARKING (all cars keys are gathered at same spot that anyone can pick someone else car, no one even knew i picked my car keys ), wall is cracked and has some scratches, i am a patient person i was actually okay with all of that, until i saw cockroaches behind bedroom and inside toilet , you know the funny thing is that i saw old reviews and they also had cockroaches exactly like the ones i had , this shows that the hotel doesn’t care about something happening twice , do you wanna know something sad , this hotel can go from 1 star hotel to 5 star hotel just by getting more professional staff , if it was cleaned and decorated every once in a while , it will easily be a 5 star hotel
data.title: Trash

data.text: The worst hotel experience ever. No house keeping done during my 7 days stay despite activating maje my room. On asking for towel and shower get I was yelled back. No parking despite being 4 star. The rooms were not sound proof music was loud inside room at 4 am. Dirty linen when I checked in, AC not working.  Nevar ever go close to this places
data.title: worst experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
 
We are sorry to hear about your experience and that you were let down. We take this very seriously and have taken steps to ensure this doesn’t happen again. We would like to apologize if any of our team members were unprofessional or made you feel otherwise during your stay; this is not how we conduct business at Gulfinn Hotel Al Nasr, and I’m sorry for the experience that you had.

Regards,

Management
owner_response.author: Ameer hamza

data.text:
Bad place to stay. The check-in staff is disoriented and unorganized. The room was small and bed oversized making it tough to move around. Worst part, dirty towels in the bathroom with blood stains and dirt on it. 0/5

During this covid time you should take care of the hygiene and cleanliness of the hotel rooms especially for towels. We left 10 minutes after checking in.
data.title: Bad place. Unhygienic

data.text:
Most worst hotel don't ever think of visiting here.

1. I don't know who rated this 4 star.

2. Breakfast was like you eating in 2 star only 4 or 5 items

3. Room service, Reception Service are too poor.

4. Being a 4 star they even don't have staff properly.

5. Don't ever think of visiting this hotel.
data.title: Book Only if you want to ruin your holiday
